ProductsImgs.title: Chocolate Filled Shamadan
ProductsImgs.desc: A light and crispy wafer bar generously filled with smooth chocolate cream. Perfect for a quick snack or a sweet treat on the go, it combines the crunch of wafer with the richness of chocolate in every bite. Loved by both kids and adults alike.

ProductsImgs.title: Light Bisk
ProductsImgs.desc: A wholesome biscuit made with oats for a healthy and nutritious snack. Rich in fiber and full of natural goodness, Light Bisk is a guilt-free option for those who care about their health without compromising on taste.

ProductsImgs.title: Katakito
ProductsImgs.desc: Thick and bold, Katakito is a wide biscuit bar drenched in rich chocolate. Its firm texture and deep chocolate flavor make it the ideal companion for a coffee break, a school snack, or just a moment of pure indulgence.

ProductsImgs.title: Tipo
ProductsImgs.desc: A fun, round-shaped biscuit covered in a layer of fine chocolate and filled with a creamy center. Tipo is the perfect combination of crunch and cream — playful in shape, satisfying in flavor, and made for those who crave something a little different.

ProductsImgs.title: Chocolate Covered Shamadan
ProductsImgs.desc: Indulge in a crunchy wafer bar that's not only filled with velvety chocolate cream but also fully coated in a rich chocolate layer. Double the chocolate, double the joy. A satisfying bite that melts in your mouth and keeps you reaching for more.

ProductsImgs.title: Nawaem
ProductsImgs.desc: Delicate and soft tea biscuits that melt gently in your mouth. Perfect for pairing with tea or coffee, Nawaem adds a touch of comfort to your daily routine. Light, airy, and pleasantly simple.

ProductsImgs.title: Wave
ProductsImgs.desc: Crispy wafer fingers layered with smooth vanilla cream for a classic flavor everyone loves. Light, crunchy, and not too sweet — Wave is perfect for those who appreciate a timeless snack that never goes out of style.

ProductsImgs.title: White Chocolate Shamadan
ProductsImgs.desc: A crispy wafer bar filled and coated with luscious white chocolate cream. Its smooth and sweet flavor offers a delicate twist for white chocolate lovers who enjoy a crunchy texture with a creamy heart.

ProductsImgs.title: HD Biscuit
ProductsImgs.desc: A crispy, multi-layered wafer filled with intense chocolate cream. HD brings a bolder crunch with every bite, designed for those who enjoy rich chocolate and a satisfying crispiness all in one.

ProductsImgs.title: Pure Happiness
ProductsImgs.desc: A sleek, dark chocolate bar crafted for true chocolate lovers. Simple, elegant, and intense — Pure Happiness offers a rich cocoa flavor with just the right balance of bitterness and sweetness. A moment of calm in every bite.

ProductsImgs.title: Duetto
ProductsImgs.desc: Soft biscuit filled with natural date paste, offering a delightful blend of sweetness and tradition. Duetto is inspired by classic Middle Eastern flavors — a nutritious, energy-boosting snack with a soft texture and authentic taste.
